name: Warcube
description: Become the WARCUBE. Crush your enemies, siege castles, and bring glory to your six-sided self! These cubes were made for battle, not building.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core CPU, 2.3+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB VRAM Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 3+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM Storage: 1500 MB available space
